description: No abstraction shall take place at National Grid Reference <<NGR>> unless the Licence Holder has installed a << measuring device >> that is capable of continuous measurement of the residual flow in the <<water body name>> in accordance with British Standard 3680/ISO 1100 at National Grid Reference <<NGR>> at point “<<point reference>>” on the Licence Map and Plan(s)/Drawing(s) <<plan/drawing reference(s)>>
